hero.title: Exceptional Fleet
hero.subtitle: Experience Ultimate Luxury in Dubai
hero.description: Discover our meticulously curated collection of Rolls-Royce vehicles. Each model represents the pinnacle of automotive excellence, combining legendary craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology for an unparalleled driving experience.

overview.title: Our Exclusive Collection
overview.description: Each Rolls-Royce in our fleet is carefully selected and maintained to deliver the ultimate luxury experience. From the flagship Phantom to the adventurous Cullinan, find the perfect vehicle for your Dubai journey.

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.description: The flagship Rolls-Royce Phantom sets the standard for ultra-luxury sedans. With its handcrafted interior, whisper-quiet Magic Carpet Ride, and commanding presence, the Phantom is the ultimate expression of automotive excellence.

cullinan.name: Cullinan
cullinan.description: The Rolls-Royce Cullinan is the world's most luxurious SUV, combining the supreme refinement of a Rolls-Royce with the capability to tackle any terrain. Perfect for families or adventures in ultimate style.

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.description: The Rolls-Royce Ghost delivers the perfect balance of luxury and performance. With its contemporary design and advanced technology, the Ghost offers a more engaging driving experience while maintaining Rolls-Royce's legendary refinement.

dawn.name: Dawn
dawn.description: The Rolls-Royce Dawn is a sensual, seductive drophead that offers the most social of driving experiences. With its fabric roof and exquisite craftsmanship, it transforms Dubai's perfect weather into an open-air luxury journey.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.description: The Rolls-Royce Wraith is the most powerful and dynamic Rolls-Royce ever created. This grand tourer combines extraordinary performance with the brand's signature luxury, making it perfect for those who want to make a statement.

spectre.name: Spectre
spectre.description: The Rolls-Royce Spectre is a historic milestone ‚Äî the first fully electric Rolls-Royce ever built. With 577hp of instant torque, whisper-silent operation, and over 520km of range, the Spectre redefines luxury motoring for a sustainable future.

why_choose.title: Why Choose Our Fleet
why_choose.subtitle: Experience unmatched luxury and service excellence

reasons.title: Premium Selection
reasons.description: Only the finest, newest Rolls-Royce models with meticulous maintenance and care

reasons.title: Perfect Condition
reasons.description: Regular servicing by certified technicians ensures every vehicle is in pristine condition

reasons.title: Comprehensive Insurance
reasons.description: Full coverage protection for peace of mind during your luxury experience

reasons.title: Professional Chauffeurs
reasons.description: Expertly trained, multilingual drivers available for the ultimate VIP experience

reasons.title: 24/7 Support
reasons.description: Round-the-clock assistance and support for any needs during your rental

reasons.title: Flexible Options
reasons.description: Hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly rental packages to suit your needs

comparison.title: Compare Our Vehicles
comparison.subtitle: Find the perfect Rolls-Royce for your Dubai experience

cta.title: Ready to Experience Ultimate Luxury?
cta.description: Contact us today to reserve your perfect Rolls-Royce and create unforgettable memories in Dubai.

cullinanBlackBadge.title: Cullinan
cullinanBlackBadge.subtitle: The Darkest Expression of Rolls-Royce. 600 HP of Uncompromising Power.

whatIs.title: What is Black Badge?
whatIs.desc: Black Badge is the alter ego of Rolls-Royce ‚Äî created for those who reject conformity. Every element is amplified: more power, darker aesthetics, bolder character. The Cullinan Black Badge is the most commanding SUV on Earth.

features.title: Darkened Spirit of Ecstasy
features.desc: High-gloss black chrome Spirit of Ecstasy with dark surround ‚Äî the hallmark of Black Badge exclusivity.

features.title: Carbon Fibre Spirit of Ecstasy
features.desc: Optional carbon fibre composite Spirit of Ecstasy, the most technically advanced version ever created.

features.title: 22" Forged Alloy Wheels
features.desc: Bespoke 22-inch dark-finish forged alloy wheels with Black Badge center caps.

features.title: Darker Exterior Chrome
features.desc: All exterior chrome surfaces replaced with dark chrome ‚Äî grille, window surrounds, and lower air intakes.

features.title: Bespoke Interior
features.desc: Technical carbon fibre veneer with woven pattern, illuminated fascia, and Forge Yellow accent stitching.

features.title: Enhanced Exhaust Note
features.desc: Retuned exhaust system delivering a more assertive, deeper tone befitting the Black Badge character.

related.title: Related Services
related.subtitle: Experience the Black Badge with our premium services

events.title: Events & Red Carpet
events.desc: The Black Badge commands attention at every event. Make the ultimate statement at galas and premieres.

corporate.title: Corporate Service
corporate.desc: For executives who demand more. The Black Badge projects power and ambition for high-stakes business.

photoshoot.title: Photoshoot Service
photoshoot.desc: The dark aesthetic of Black Badge creates stunning visual content for editorial and commercial shoots.

ghostBlackBadge.title: Ghost
ghostBlackBadge.subtitle: The Most Driver-Focused Rolls-Royce. 592 HP. Illuminated Fascia. Carbon Fibre Wheels.

whatIs.title: What is Black Badge?
whatIs.desc: Black Badge represents the dark, rebellious alter ego of Rolls-Royce. The Ghost Black Badge takes the world's most technologically advanced super-luxury car and amplifies every dimension ‚Äî more power, darker aesthetics, a more dynamic character.

features.title: Darkened Spirit of Ecstasy
features.desc: High-gloss black chrome Spirit of Ecstasy ‚Äî the unmistakable signature of Black Badge rebellion.

features.title: Illuminated Fascia
features.desc: The Black Badge Ghost features an illuminated fascia with 850 stars that create a constellation effect behind the dashboard veneer.

features.title: 21" Composite Wheels
features.desc: Carbon fibre composite wheels ‚Äî the most technically advanced wheels ever fitted to a Rolls-Royce, saving 4kg per wheel.

features.title: Darker Exterior Elements
features.desc: Dark chrome grille, window surrounds, lower air intakes, and exhaust finishers replace the standard silver chrome.

features.title: Bespoke Audio
features.desc: 18-speaker, 1,300W Bespoke Audio system with individual speaker excitation for concert-hall sound quality.

features.title: Planar Suspension Tuned
features.desc: Black Badge-tuned Planar suspension with Flagbearer system for a more connected, dynamic driving experience.

related.title: Related Services
related.subtitle: Experience the Black Badge with our premium services

corporate.title: Corporate Service
corporate.desc: The Ghost Black Badge is the ultimate executive car. Dark elegance for DIFC and Business Bay.

chauffeur.title: Chauffeur Service
chauffeur.desc: Professional chauffeur with your Black Badge. The most sophisticated way to travel Dubai.

airport.title: Airport Transfer
airport.desc: VIP airport arrival in the Ghost Black Badge. Unmatched presence at DXB and DWC.

phantom.name: Rolls-Royce Phantom
phantom.description: Experience automotive perfection with the flagship Rolls-Royce Phantom
phantom.longDescription: The Rolls-Royce Phantom stands as the ultimate expression of luxury motoring. With its commanding presence, unparalleled craftsmanship, and revolutionary technology, the Phantom offers an experience that transcends mere transportation. Every journey becomes a celebration of success and refinement.

features.title: Magic Carpet Ride
features.desc: Revolutionary suspension system for otherworldly comfort

features.title: Starlight Headliner
features.desc: 1,340 fiber optic lights create your personal night sky

features.title: The Gallery
features.desc: Bespoke artwork space across the dashboard

features.title: Whisper Quiet
features.desc: World's quietest car with 130kg of sound insulation

features.title: Extended Wheelbase
features.desc: Ultimate rear passenger space and comfort

features.title: Bespoke Audio
features.desc: 18-speaker system tuned to perfection

features.title: Champagne Cooler
features.desc: Integrated cooling for your celebrations

features.title: Privacy Suite
features.desc: Electrochromatic glass for instant privacy
